to be old, ancient (o-rae-doe-da): to tidy up the room (bang-eul chi-u-da)
to run the washing machine (se-tak-gi-reul dol-li-da)
to make an international call (guk-je jeon-hwa-reul ha-da)
to make a video call (yeong-sang tong-hwa-reul ha-da)
I dialed the wrong number (jeon-hwa-reul jal-mot geo-reo-sseo-yo)
Please set to silent/vibrate mode (mae-neo mo-deu-ro ha-se-yo / jin-dong-eu-ro ha-se-yo)
매너 모드로 하세요 / 진동으로 하세요 (mae-neo mo-deu-ro ha-se-yo / jin-dong-eu-ro ha-se-yo)
My phone battery is dead (hyu-dae jeon-hwa bae-te-ri-ga eop-seo-yo)
휴대 전화 배터리가 없어요 (hyu-dae jeon-hwa bae-te-ri-ga eop-seo-yo)
What is your phone number? (jeon-hwa-beon-ho-ga myeot beo-ni-e-yo?)
Not available right now (ji-geum an gye-se-yo)
